DeceptionTechniques.Name: PCAP Collection
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Collect full network traffic for future research and analysis.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Protocol Decoder
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Use software designed to deobfuscate or decrypt adversary command and control (C2) or data exfiltration traffic.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Credentials
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Create user credentials that are used for active defense purposes.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Pocket Litter
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Place data on a system to reinforce the legitimacy of the system or user.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Software Manipulation
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Make changes to a system's software properties and functions to achieve a desired effect.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: API Monitoring
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Monitor local APIs that might be used by adversary tools and activity.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Network Manipulation
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Make changes to network properties and functions to achieve a desired effect.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Application Diversity
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Present the adversary with a variety of installed applications and services.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Security Controls
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Alter security controls to make the system more or less vulnerable to attack.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Content
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Seed content that can be used to lead an adversary in a specific direction, entice a behavior, etc.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Admin Access
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Modify a user's administrative privileges.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Network Monitoring
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Monitor network traffic in order to detect adversary activity.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy System
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Configure a computing system to serve as an attack target or experimental environment.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Behavioral Analytics
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Deploy tools that detect unusual system or user behavior.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Baseline
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Identify key system elements to establish a baseline and be prepared to reset a system to that baseline when necessary.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Process
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Execute software on a target system for the purposes of the defender.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Network Diversity
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Use a diverse set of devices on the network to help establish the legitimacy of a decoy network.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Peripheral Management
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Manage peripheral devices used on systems within the network for active defense purposes.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: System Activity Monitoring
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Collect system activity logs which can reveal adversary activity.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Account
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Create an account that is used for active defense purposes.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Burn-In
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Exercise a target system in a manner where it will generate desirable system artifacts.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Diversity
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Deploy a set of decoy systems with different OS and software configurations.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Migrate Attack Vector
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Move a malicious link, file, or device from its intended location to a decoy system or network for execution/use.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Isolation
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Configure devices, systems, networks, etc. to contain activity and data in order to promote inspection or prevent expanding an engagement beyond desired limits.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Standard Operating Procedure
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Establish a structured way of interacting with systems so that non-standard interactions are more easily detectable.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Hardware Manipulation
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Alter the hardware configuration of a system to limit what an adversary can do with the device.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Network
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Create a target network with a set of target systems, for the purpose of active defense.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Detonate Malware
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Execute malware under controlled conditions to analyze its functionality.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Backup and Recovery
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Make copies of key system software, configuration, and data to enable rapid system restoration.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: User Training
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Train users to detect malicious intent or activity, how to report it, etc.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Email Manipulation
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Modify the flow or contents of email.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Decoy Persona
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Develop personal information (aka a backstory) about a user and plant data to support that backstory.

DeceptionTechniques.Name: Hunting
DeceptionTechniques.Description: Search for the presence of or information about an adversary, or your organization, its employees, infrastructure, etc.
